channel.title: Lua on jdhao's digital space
channel.description: Recent content in Lua on jdhao's digital space

item.title: Variadic Arguments in Lua
item.description: In Lua, to pass variable number of arguments, we can use ... (three ellipses) syntax in function argument.

item.title: Lua Learning Notes
item.description: As a long time nvim user, I am learning Lua and slowly transition my nvim config to lua. In this script, I will share some tips and lessons I have learned the hard way.
